src/systems/ComboSystem.ts.description: ComboSystem already has basic combo tracking with increment(), reset(), getMultiplier(), getRemainingTime(). Uses COMBO_TIMEOUT (2s) and COMBO_MULTIPLIER_RATE (0.1). Emits 'combo-updated' events via EventBus. Missing: milestone detection and events.

src/ui/HUD.ts.description: HUD already displays score and combo with pulse animations. Has setupEventListeners for score-updated, combo-updated, lives-changed. Missing: combo timer countdown bar and score pop effects.

src/systems/SlashSystem.ts.description: SlashSystem handles scoring with combo multiplier integration. Calculates score per monster type from MONSTER_BASE_POINTS. Has createHitEffect() for visual feedback. Missing: multi-kill tracking per update cycle and floating score text.

src/config/constants.ts.description: COMBO_MILESTONES already defined as [5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 40, 50, 75, 100]. COMBO_TIMEOUT = 2.0s. MONSTER_BASE_POINTS: zombie=10, vampire=15, ghost=20. Need to add MULTI_KILL_BONUS constants.

src/systems/ParticleSystem.ts.description: ParticleSystem has multiple particle types (SPARKLE, FIRE, LIGHTNING, etc.) with object pooling. Has emit() for one-shot effects, createWeaponTrail(), createHitEffect(). Suitable for combo milestone effects but needs new configurations added.
